name: Jingle Bell Mouse
desc: Each click rings a tiny bell attached to the mouse, and with every jingle, a present magically appears.

upgrades.name: Silver Chime Amplifier
upgrades.desc: Amplifies the jingle, increasing the number of presents generated per click/ring. Cursors are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Golden Bell Alloy
upgrades.desc: Upgrades the bell to a golden alloy, which doubles the number of presents produced with each ring. Cursors are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Crystal Clapper
upgrades.desc: A crystal clapper that resonates with festive energy, multiplying the number of presents with each click/ring. Cursors are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Enchanted Ribbons
upgrades.desc: Magical ribbons attached to the mouse, adding an extra present with every click. Mouse and cursors gain +0.1 points for every non-cursor asset owned.

upgrades.name: Elf-Tuned Bells
upgrades.desc: Elves tune the bells to optimize present production, significantly increasing the presents per click/ring. Mouse and cursors gain +0.5 presents for every non-cursor asset owned.

upgrades.name: Harmony Bells
upgrades.desc: Synchronized clicks create a melody that generates a burst of additional presents. Mouse and cursors gain +5 presents for every non-cursor asset owned.

upgrades.name: Celestial Bell Ring
upgrades.desc: Upgrades the jingle to a celestial level, producing a flurry of presents with each click/ring. Mouse and cursors gain +50 presents for every non-cursor asset owned.

upgrades.name: Eternal Echo Bell
upgrades.desc: The bell's ring echoes, repeating the present output generated by previous clicks. Mouse and cursors gain +500 presents for every non-cursor asset owned.

upgrades.name: Rudolph's Red Nose Resonator
upgrades.desc: Integrates Rudolph's magic, causing some clicks/rings to produce a dazzling array of extra presents. Mouse and cursors gain +500 presents for every non-cursor asset owned.

upgrades.name: Santa's Secret Charm
upgrades.desc: Infused with Santa's charm, vastly increasing the number of unique presents generated per click. Mouse and cursors gain +5000 presents for every non-cursor asset owned.

name: Elf Workshop
desc: Elves busily crafting toys and gifts, with each upgrade bringing in more elves, faster production, or enhanced efficiency.

upgrades.name: Magic Toolbelt
upgrades.desc: Elves are equipped with magical toolbelts that increase their toy-making speed, doubling the efficiency of Elf workshops.

upgrades.name: Enhanced Elf Training Program
upgrades.desc: Introduces a new training regimen that makes the elves twice as fast and efficient in their crafting.

upgrades.name: Enchanted Woodwork Tools
upgrades.desc: Upgrades all tools in the workshop to enchanted versions, allowing elves to work at double their usual speed.

upgrades.name: Efficient Assembly Line
upgrades.desc: Revamps the workshop with an efficient assembly line system, streamlining the gift-making process and doubling productivity.

upgrades.name: Holiday Spirit Boost
upgrades.desc: A sprinkle of holiday spirit invigorates the elves, boosting their morale and doubling their work rate.

upgrades.name: Time-Bending Clock
upgrades.desc: Installs a magical clock that slows down time inside the workshop, effectively doubling the elves' output.

upgrades.name: Automated Gift Wrapping Station
upgrades.desc: Adds an automated wrapping station that works in tandem with the elves, doubling the number of completed presents.

upgrades.name: Santa's Secret Blueprints
upgrades.desc: Grants access to Santa's secret blueprints for new toys, allowing elves to produce a wider variety of gifts at double the speed.

upgrades.name: Mystical Efficiency Elixir
upgrades.desc: Elves drink a mystical elixir that enhances their speed and precision, doubling the workshop's gift output.

upgrades.name: North Pole Energy Source
upgrades.desc: Taps into a powerful energy source hidden deep beneath the North Pole, supercharging the entire workshop and doubling its production capabilities.

name: Reindeer Stables
desc: Churning out reindeer that deliver presents across the uniVERSE and beyond.

upgrades.name: Enhanced Reindeer Feed
upgrades.desc: Introduces a new blend of magical feed that doubles the reindeers' energy and speed.

upgrades.name: Formula 1 Stalls
upgrades.desc: Redesigns the stalls in line for Formula standards, allowing reindeer to take off and land more efficiently, doubling their delivery speed.

upgrades.name: Rudolph's Leadership Training
upgrades.desc: Rudolph trains other reindeer to navigate more effectively, doubling their present delivery rate.

upgrades.name: Starlight Navigation System
upgrades.desc: Implements a celestial navigation system that guides the reindeer more accurately, doubling their delivery efficiency.

upgrades.name: Magical Antler Polish
upgrades.desc: A special polish for antlers that enhances the reindeer's magical abilities, allowing them to fly twice as fast.

upgrades.name: Thermal Insulated Harnesses
upgrades.desc: Upgrades the harnesses to keep the reindeer comfortable in extreme weather, enhancing their stamina and doubling delivery speed.

upgrades.name: Night Sky Camouflage
upgrades.desc: Equips the reindeer with camouflage that blends with the night sky, enabling faster travel by avoiding detection.

upgrades.name: Aurora Borealis Energy Infusion
upgrades.desc: Harnesses the energy of the Aurora Borealis, infusing the reindeer with it to double their flight speed and endurance.

upgrades.name: Warp Speed Sleigh Bells
upgrades.desc: Adds bells that resonate at worm-hole-generating frequency. The reindeer through the worm holes to save time as they deliver presents, doubling their efficiency.

upgrades.name: Quantum Leap Technology
upgrades.desc: Introduces quantum technology that enables reindeer to instantaneously leap between locations, doubling delivery efficiency yet again.

name: Santa's Sleigh
desc: A foundational element of any self-respecting present delivery system.

upgrades.name: Turbocharged Rocket Boosters
upgrades.desc: Upgrades the sleigh with powerful rocket boosters, enabling double the speed.

upgrades.name: Hyper-Efficient Gift Compartment
upgrades.desc: Expands and organizes the gift compartment using spatial magic, doubling the number of presents it can carry.

upgrades.name: Auto-Navigation System
upgrades.desc: Implements an advanced navigation system that plots the most efficient routes, doubling delivery efficiency.

upgrades.name: Ergonomic Keyboard
upgrades.desc: Ensuring comfort during long coding sessions, this keyboard reduces strain and elevates coding speed. Junior Devs are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Invisibility Cloak Technology
upgrades.desc: Equips the sleigh with an invisibility cloak, allowing Santa to travel unnoticed and double his delivery speed.

upgrades.name: Meteor-Resistant Shielding
upgrades.desc: Fortifies the sleigh with a shield that protects against meteors and harsh weather, ensuring uninterrupted travel at double the efficiency.

upgrades.name: Time Warp Drive
upgrades.desc: Integrates a drive that manipulates time, allowing Santa to deliver twice as many gifts in the same amount of time.

upgrades.name: Dimensional Rift Generator
upgrades.desc: Allows the sleigh to create and travel through dimensional rifts, significantly reducing travel time and doubling efficiency.

upgrades.name: Universal Gravity Stabilizer
upgrades.desc: Stabilizes gravitational forces around the sleigh, allowing for faster and more efficient travel through different planetary systems.

upgrades.name: Antimatter Propulsion Engine
upgrades.desc: Replaces traditional propulsion with an antimatter engine, offering near-limitless energy and exponentially increasing the sleigh's speed.

upgrades.name: Wormhole Navigation Console
upgrades.desc: Incorporates a console that maps and navigates through wormholes, allowing for instantaneous travel across the universe, dramatically enhancing delivery capabilities.

name: Christmas Forest
desc: A forest of Christmas trees where each tree grows presents.

upgrades.name: Luminescent Tree Sap
upgrades.desc: Trees produce a glowing sap that accelerates tree growth and present production, effectively doubling the output of presents.

upgrades.name: Frost Fairy Fertilizer
upgrades.desc: Enlist frost fairies to sprinkle their magical fertilizer, boosting tree health and doubling the rate of present growth.

upgrades.name: Ornamental Growth Charms
upgrades.desc: Hang enchanted ornaments that enhance the trees' ability to grow presents, doubling their efficiency.

upgrades.name: Moonlight Photosynthesis Enhancement
upgrades.desc: Utilizes the magic of moonlight to supercharge the trees' photosynthesis, significantly increasing present output.

upgrades.name: Whispering Winds Melody
upgrades.desc: The winds of the forest play a special melody that encourages trees to produce twice as many gifts.

upgrades.name: Mystic Wildlife Helpers
upgrades.desc: Enlist the help of forest animals to tend to the trees, increasing the present yield by two.

upgrades.name: Evergreen Eternal Essence
upgrades.desc: Infuse the trees with an essence that ensures year-round growth, doubling of present production.

upgrades.name: Starlit Canopy Network
upgrades.desc: Connect the treetops to form a starlit network that distributes magical energy, doubling present production.

upgrades.name: Dark Matter Irrigation System
upgrades.desc: Implement a dark matter-powered irrigation system that showers the trees with heavy water from the unseen dimensions, doubling their efficiency.

upgrades.name: Dimensional Tree Expansion
upgrades.desc: Expand the trees into extra dimensions, doubling their capacity to grow presents in our dimension.

name: Snow Globe Factory
desc: A factory that produces snow globes, each containing a miniaturized winter wonderland which itself generates presents.

upgrades.name: Miniaturization Ray Enhancement
upgrades.desc: Improves the miniaturization ray used in snow globe creation, allowing for more intricate and efficient winter wonderlands that double present output.

upgrades.name: Glacial Glass Formula
upgrades.desc: Develop a special glacial glass that enhances the magic within the snow globes, leading to a doubling of present production.

upgrades.name: Enchanted Blizzard Blowers
upgrades.desc: Install blowers that create magical blizzards inside the globes, each flurry increasing the rate of present generation.

upgrades.name: Frostwork Engineers
upgrades.desc: Employ skilled frostwork engineers to design more efficient snow globes, doubling their present-generating capability.

upgrades.name: Crystal Snowflake Generator
upgrades.desc: A machine that generates perfect Fibonacci-ratio crystal snowflakes, each adding to the globe's ability to produce presents.

upgrades.name: Winter Spirit Infusion
upgrades.desc: Infuse each snow globe with the spirit of winter, significantly enhancing its present-generating power.

upgrades.name: Icicle Precision Tools
upgrades.desc: Upgrade the factory tools to icicle precision models, allowing for faster and more efficient snow globe production.

upgrades.name: Polar Aurora Power Source
upgrades.desc: Tap into the power of the polar aurora to energize the snow globes, doubling their efficiency.

upgrades.name: Timeless Code Techniques
upgrades.desc: Implementing age-old tricks that never fail to deliver. Shadowy Supercoders are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Zero-Gravity Crafting Chamber
upgrades.desc: Introduce a zero-gravity chamber where snow globes are crafted, enhancing precision and efficiency in the magical assembly process.

upgrades.name: Interdimensional Winter Realms
upgrades.desc: Expand the factory's capabilities to include winter realms from various dimensions, vastly increasing the variety and number of presents produced.

name: North Pole CC
desc: The hub of Christmas operations, controlling global gift distribution and elf activities.

upgrades.name: Advanced Logistics Software
upgrades.desc: Implement cutting-edge software that doubles the efficiency of gift distribution and elf coordination.

upgrades.name: Global Weather Monitoring System
upgrades.desc: A high-tech system that predicts and adapts to global weather conditions, ensuring seamless operations and doubling efficiency.

upgrades.name: Teleportation Delivery Network
upgrades.desc: Integrate a teleportation system that instantly transports gifts from the North Pole to their destinations, doubling delivery speed.

upgrades.name: Elf Augmented Reality Interface
upgrades.desc: Equip elves with AR goggles that display real-time analytics and instructions, doubling their productivity.

upgrades.name: Sentient AI Coordinator
upgrades.desc: Install an AI coordinator with advanced decision-making capabilities to oversee and optimize all North Pole operations, doubling efficiency.

upgrades.name: Quantum Computing Center
upgrades.desc: Upgrade to a quantum computing system that can process and manage operations at unprecedented speeds, doubling overall efficiency.

upgrades.name: Holographic Global Monitoring
upgrades.desc: Implement a holographic display of the world that tracks and manages global gift delivery in real-time, doubling operational efficiency.

upgrades.name: Interstellar Communication Array
upgrades.desc: A communication system that connects the North Pole with extraterrestrial civilizations, bringing interstellar efficiency to the operation.

upgrades.name: Temporal Synchronization Device
upgrades.desc: Synchronize time across the universe to maximize the efficiency of gift production and delivery, effectively doubling output.

upgrades.name: Universal Energy Harnessing Station
upgrades.desc: Harness energy from cosmic phenomena to power the entire Command Center, doubling efficiency and capacity.

name: Mech Toy Factory
desc: An advanced manufacturing facility at the North Pole, using AI and robotics to create gifts at an accelerated pace.

upgrades.name: Precision Robotics Upgrade
upgrades.desc: Integrate advanced robotics that double the assembly speed and accuracy of toy production.

upgrades.name: 3D Holographic Design Stations
upgrades.desc: Equip the factory with 3D holographic design tools, allowing for rapid prototyping and doubling production rates.

upgrades.name: AI-Powered Quality Control
upgrades.desc: Implement AI systems for meticulous quality control, ensuring flawless production that effectively doubles output.

upgrades.name: Automated Testing Conveyors
upgrades.desc: Streamline the testing phase with conveyor belts equipped with sensors and diagnostic tools, speeding up the process and doubling efficiency.

upgrades.name: Nanotechnology Assembly Lines
upgrades.desc: Utilize nanotech in assembly lines to construct toys at a molecular level, significantly increasing precision and doubling output.

upgrades.name: Virtual Reality Testing Labs
upgrades.desc: Test and refine toys in virtual environments, streamlining the development process and doubling production efficiency.

upgrades.name: Cybernetic Elf Assistants
upgrades.desc: Upgrade the workforce with cybernetic enhancements, doubling their efficiency in managing the automated systems.

upgrades.name: Fusion Energy Reactors
upgrades.desc: Power the factory with clean and highly efficient fusion reactors, significantly increasing the energy available for toy production, which is doubled.

upgrades.name: Antigravity Transportation Systems
upgrades.desc: Implement antigravity systems for material handling and toy movement, streamlining logistics and doubling output capacity.

upgrades.name: Interdimensional Manufacturing Portal
upgrades.desc: Open portals to parallel dimensions for accessing additional resources and manufacturing space, effectively doubling the factory's production capabilities.

name: Stellar Generator
desc: Harnessing the energy of the Christmas Star, this celestial body magically creates presents through its radiant energy.

upgrades.name: Asteroid Belt Material Harvester
upgrades.desc: Utilize resources harvested from asteroid belts to fuel the present generation, effectively doubling output.

upgrades.name: Celestial Energy Amplifier
upgrades.desc: Harness and amplify the energy from nearby stars, doubling the generator's capacity to produce presents.

upgrades.name: Pulsar Power Converter
upgrades.desc: Convert pulsar emissions into usable energy, greatly enhancing the efficiency and doubling the output of the generator.

upgrades.name: Neutron Star Core Integration
upgrades.desc: Tap into the dense core of a neutron star to power the generator, doubling its present-producing capabilities.

upgrades.name: Supernova Energy Capture
upgrades.desc: Harness the energy released from supernovas to supercharge the present generation process, doubling the output.

upgrades.name: Gravitational Lensing Focus
upgrades.desc: Use gravitational lensing to focus cosmic energy into the generator, doubling its efficiency.

upgrades.name: Quantum Entanglement Communicator
upgrades.desc: Implement quantum entanglement technology to instantly gather resources from across the galaxy, doubling present production.

upgrades.name: Galactic Core Syphon
upgrades.desc: Syphon energy from the galaxy's core, using its immense power to double the generator's present output.

upgrades.name: Black Hole Stabilizer
upgrades.desc: Stabilize and draw energy from nearby black holes, providing an immense power boost to the present generation process.

upgrades.name: Cosmic Fabric Weaver
upgrades.desc: Manipulate the very fabric of space-time to create pockets of accelerated time, doubling the rate of present creation.

name: Present Synthesizer
desc: Leverages the fundamental forces of the universe to materialize presents out of thin air.

upgrades.name: Dark Matter Manipulator
upgrades.desc: Harnesses the elusive power of dark matter to double the synthesizer's present output.

upgrades.name: Quantum Fabricator Module
upgrades.desc: Utilizes quantum mechanics to fabricate presents at a subatomic level, doubling production.

upgrades.name: Multiverse Resource Extractor
upgrades.desc: Extracts materials from parallel universes, vastly expanding the synthesizer's capacity and doubling its output.

upgrades.name: Cosmic String Harp
upgrades.desc: Plays on cosmic strings, vibrations of which create ripples in space-time, manifesting presents at double the rate.

upgrades.name: Neutrino Wave Generator
upgrades.desc: Utilizes high-energy neutrino waves to power the synthesizer, significantly boosting its efficiency and doubling output.

upgrades.name: Photon Resonance Chamber
upgrades.desc: A chamber that harnesses photon resonance to materialize presents, doubling the rate of production.

upgrades.name: Event Horizon Stabilizer
upgrades.desc: Stabilizes the event horizons of black holes to capture energy, immensely powering the synthesizer and doubling output.

upgrades.name: Galactic Supercluster Conduit
upgrades.desc: Connects to a supercluster of galaxies, tapping into their collective energy to once again double present output.

upgrades.name: Dimensional Folding Array
upgrades.desc: Employs dimensional folding techniques to access infinite spaces, significantly multiplying the synthesizer's capacity and doubling its output.

upgrades.name: Singularity Core Generator
upgrades.desc: Uses a contained singularity to generate an infinite amount of energy, allowing for double the present creation.
